task: Oil change and removing and cleaning the oil sump
details: Complete oil change procedure. Use 20W-50 oil with high ZDDP content. Ensure proper torque on drain plug (20-25 lbf ft). Replace oil filter.
Coolant currently low from overflow, planning to drain and refill once car is moved to garage
Oil level reported as below minimum on dipstick - immediate top-up needed
Looking for thermostat parts - research phase
